value:
$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|Eirika, are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_WinterFes18,Face|Brother! I've been so worried! Seeing
your face again warms my heart.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_WinterFes18,Face|It seems like everyone's together
now. Must be time for the festival's
grand finale... Shall we watch?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_WinterFes18,Face|Yeah! Let's play! Let's play!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes! Victory is ours!$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Good going, Sharena! Too bad I had
to lose for you to win. Oh, well.$k$p$EFace_Pain|I just wanted to give presents to
everyone back home in Nifl...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Aw, Princess Ylgr...$k$p$EFace|Actually—I know! Why don't we just
let you have the reward?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Um... A-are you...sure?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|We appreciate the thought, but we
couldn't possibly accept such a—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Don't worry! The winter festival
envoy will be bringing us presents,
so it's really no problem.$k$pPlease, you should take the reward
and bring some happiness to the
people of Nifl. Right, Commander?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Well...now that you've said all that,
I can't very well say no, now can I?
So, yes—please, take it all!$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Wow! You're all so generous! Thank
you so much. We won't forget this!
I hope we can meet again soon.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Thank you, all of you. Now, let's be
careful on our way home, Ylgr. We
don't want to damage the presents.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Right. I'll be extra careful!
Bye, everyone!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|...Ah, that youthful enthusiasm takes
me right back to when I was her age.$k$pBack when I was young and innocent,
I used to wait up on festival nights.$k$pIf I was a good girl during the year,
I knew the winter festival envoy
would bring me the gifts I wanted...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes! I did the exact same thing!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|But thinking about it now, there's no
way one person could deliver gifts to
every single child... How funny!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Huh? What are you saying,
Commander Anna?$k$pSurely the winter festival envoy
exists, right? Who would give gifts
to all the children otherwise?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Well, umm...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Every year, when the time of the
winter festival arrives, I wake up and
get presents—just like everyone!$k$pAnd it's not like it's a dream...
Alfonse even saw the winter festival
envoy once! Isn't that right, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Umm... Yeah, one time...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse...
Don't tell me you never told her...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Sharena is such a devout believer,
I felt like telling her the truth would
break her heart. I just couldn't do it...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I promise I've been good this year,
winter festival envoy, so please
bring me lots of presents!$k$p$Sbs150|
